Hymn.Arabic: يَا رَبُّ اسْتَمِعْ صَلاتِي. أنصِتْ بِحَقِّكَ إلَى طِلْبَنِي إِسْتَجِبْ لِي بِعَدَلِك
Hymn.English: 143:1 Hear my prayer, O Lord, Give ear to my supplications! In Your faithfulness answer me, And in Your righteousness.

Hymn.Arabic: وَلَا تَدْخُلُ فِي الْمُحَاكَمَةِ مَعَ عَبْدِكَ هَللويا.
Hymn.English: 2 Do not enter into judgment with Your servant.     Alleluia
